name: ryan-adams
title: Ryan Adams Don't Look Down
description: In 2004, Ryan Adams fell off a stage and broke his wrist.  A few months later Danny Clinch started filming him as he  recovered, formed a band and released three full length albums. There is three hundred hours of footage shot over the course of this manically busy year.  The film is in post.

name: varvatos-paul
title: John Varvatos feat. Paul Weller & Miles Kane
description: Paul Weller and Miles Kane pawn their items for John Varvatos.
